Bytecode starts with 0xEF (we support EIP-3541 in Berlin hardfork). Equivalent tests: zkevm-testvectors/tools-calldata/evm/generate-test-vectors/gen-op-create.json [id: from 4 to 7] & zkevm-testvectors/tools-calldata/evm/generate-test-vectors/gen-test-deploy.json [id: from 8 to 9]
